name: Supply Chain Tactics
description: Logistical strategies for maintaining a steady flow of supplies in warfare scenarios.

cards.title: Supply Line Defense and Disruption
cards.description: Strategies for securing and disrupting enemy supply chains.
cards.bulletpoints: Logistical hubs, interdiction operations, convoy protection
cards.summaryText: Fortify your own hubs while planning interdiction raids and convoy escorts that choke enemy supplies without starving friendly forces.

cards.title: Sustaining Operations in Warzones
cards.description: Ensuring continuous resupply during prolonged engagements.
cards.bulletpoints: Strategic stockpiling, resupply missions, wartime rationing
cards.summaryText: Balance stockpiles, rotating resupply missions, and ration policies so frontline units stay equipped through drawn-out campaigns.
